name: 7 Days In My Brother's House
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: This game will be distributed for FREE once it is finished. Payment of $4.99 or more gives you access to monthly builds while the game is being created. Payment of $9.99 or more gives you access to nightly/bleeding-edge builds when available. Free demos are released once monthly, delayed a month from the current status of the game.

A short RPG Maker (VX Ace) game about a sister visiting her older brother and his fiancee. The sister will be trying to make sure her brother ends up babied; this may be done out of concern or as revenge, depending on the player's choices.

The current demo just offers a small taste of what's to come, ending right after the first night and transition to the first day.
